title: Minecraft 1.7.10 启动参数整理
author: zeithrold
txt_content:
参考了HMCL与Minecraft官方启动器的启动参数
参考链接：
1. https://www.oracle.com/technetwork/cn/articles/java/g1gc-1984535-zhs.html
2. https://www.reddit.com/r/feedthebeast/comments/biy7qs/what_does_the_dfmlignorepatchdiscrepancies_jvm/
3. https://mcforge.readthedocs.io/en/1.14.x/concepts/jarsigning/

-Dfml.ignoreInvalidMinecraftCertificates=true 仍存疑

熬夜制作，一定有质量上的问题，若有错误麻烦指正一下谢谢了。
